stateDiagram

BOOT1

BOOT1 : BOOT1

BOOT1 : enter / #123; ramp_init_up()#59; #125;

BOOT1 : do / #123; ramp_up(FAST)#59; #125;

BOOT2

BOOT2 : BOOT2

BOOT2 : enter / #123; ramp_init_up()#59; #125;

BOOT2 : do / #123; ramp_up(MEDIUM)#59; #125;

state RUNNING_GROUP {

        RUNNING_OK

        RUNNING_OK : RUNNING_OK

        RUNNING_OK : enter / #123; ramp_init_up()#59; #125;

        RUNNING_OK : do / #123; ramp_up(SLOW)#59; #125;

        RUNNING_OK_SEQ2

        RUNNING_OK_SEQ2 : RUNNING_OK_SEQ2

        RUNNING_OK_SEQ2 : enter / #123; ramp_init_down()#59; #125;

        RUNNING_OK_SEQ2 : do / #123; ramp_down(SLOW)#59; #125;

}

WARNING

WARNING : WARNING

WARNING : enter / #123; ramp_init_down()#59; #125;

WARNING : do / #123; ramp_down(MEDIUM)#59; #125;

WARNING_SEQ2

WARNING_SEQ2 : WARNING_SEQ2

WARNING_SEQ2 : enter / #123; timer_reset()#59; #125;

WARNING_SEQ2 : enter / #123; set_led_duty(0)#59; #125;

state ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE) <>

state ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_BOOT1) <>

state ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_BOOT2) <>

state ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_RUNNING_OK) <>

state ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_WARNING) <>

state ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_ERROR) <>

state ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(RETURN) <>

ERROR_SEQ1

ERROR_SEQ1 : ERROR_SEQ1

ERROR_SEQ1 : enter / #123; timer_reset()#59; #125;

ERROR_SEQ1 : enter / #123; set_led_duty(0)#59; #125;

ERROR_SEQ2

ERROR_SEQ2 : ERROR_SEQ2

ERROR_SEQ2 : enter / #123; timer_reset()#59; #125;

ERROR_SEQ2 : enter / #123; set_led_duty(255)#59; #125;

ERROR_SEQ3

ERROR_SEQ3 : ERROR_SEQ3

ERROR_SEQ3 : enter / #123; set_led_duty(0)#59; #125;

ERROR_SEQ3 : enter / #123; timer_reset()#59; #125;

state ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ERROR_CHOICE) <>

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

BOOT1 --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(RETURN) : do [is_ramp_done()]

BOOT2 --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(RETURN) : do [is_ramp_done()]

RUNNING_OK --> RUNNING_OK_SEQ2 : do [is_ramp_done()]

RUNNING_OK_SEQ2 --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(RETURN) : do [is_ramp_done()]

WARNING --> WARNING_SEQ2 : do [is_ramp_done()]

WARNING_SEQ2 --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(RETURN) : do [timer_get_ms() >= 500]

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE) --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_BOOT1)

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_BOOT1) --> BOOT1 : [IS_STATUS(BOOT1)]

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_BOOT1) --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_BOOT2) : else

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_BOOT2) --> BOOT2 : [IS_STATUS(BOOT2)]

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_BOOT2) --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_RUNNING_OK) : else

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_RUNNING_OK) --> RUNNING_OK : [IS_STATUS(RUNNING_OK)]

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_RUNNING_OK) --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_WARNING) : else

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_WARNING) --> WARNING : [IS_STATUS(WARNING)]

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_WARNING) --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_ERROR) : else

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE_ERROR) --> ERROR_SEQ1 : / #123; count = 3#59; #125;

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(RETURN) --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE)

ERROR_SEQ1 --> ERROR_SEQ2 : do [timer_get_ms() >= 100]

ERROR_SEQ2 --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ERROR_CHOICE) : do [timer_get_ms() >= 100] / #123; count--#59; #125;

ERROR_SEQ3 --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(RETURN) : do [timer_get_ms() >= 1000]

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ERROR_CHOICE) --> ERROR_SEQ1 : [count > 0]

ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ERROR_CHOICE) --> ERROR_SEQ3 : else

ROOT.(InitialState) --> ROOT.(ChoicePoint)(ROUTE)
Events
settings
